body: And yeah, it do be a bruh moment for that kid. He probably spent most of his savings customizing the doll which was why he probably looked like crap and why he couldn't handle shooting his goo without dying lol.

I have a feeling we're missing a bit of context between that time skip. What I believe happened was after the "study" session, the mom found out and forbade the teacher from ever seeing her son again. 10 years later, the kid's life is a mess and his mom tries to make amends with her son trying to justify not letting him see the teacher again, but he doesn't care. With his heavily customized sex doll that looked like the teacher, I guess he gave it one last bang and his body just gave out? The cops were probably having some kind of unrelated banter before talking about the kid and the doll.
I really wish someone in the comments would explain what the ending was ;-;
so WTF is with that ending?
Man I can only hope that is the way I go out.
